name: SuperCloner
tagline: Clone and duplicate your GoHighLevel assets instantly
description: Save hours of manual work by instantly cloning your funnels, workflows, campaigns, and entire sub-accounts. Perfect for agencies managing multiple clients who need to duplicate successful setups quickly and efficiently.

name: Zapier
description: Zapier is the go-to automation platform that connects GoHighLevel with over 6000 different applications. Automate repetitive tasks, create custom workflows, and integrate with tools like Slack, Google Sheets, and calendars without any code.

name: Make
tagline: Visual automation platform for complex workflows
description: Make (formerly Integromat) is a powerful visual automation platform that connects GoHighLevel with thousands of apps. Build complex multi-step workflows with branching logic, data transformation, and error handling. Perfect for agencies needing advanced automation beyond simple triggers.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe integrates seamlessly with GoHighLevel for sending invoices, collecting payments, and triggering automated workflows when customers make purchases. Handle subscriptions, one-time payments, and complex billing scenarios with ease.

name: Twilio
description: Connect Twilio to GoHighLevel for advanced calling and SMS capabilities. Enable two-way texting, voicemail drops, phone call routing, and automated communications to enhance your customer engagement.

name: Calendly
description: Calendly is a smart scheduling tool that integrates with GoHighLevel to make meeting booking effortless. Features include time zone detection, buffer time settings, calendar integration, and automated reminders to reduce no-shows.

name: ClickUp
description: Integrate ClickUp with GoHighLevel to automate project management tasks. When a new lead comes in, automatically create tasks in ClickUp, ensuring efficient lead follow-up and seamless project tracking.

name: Mailgun
description: Mailgun ensures your GoHighLevel emails reach the inbox, not the spam folder. With advanced deliverability features, real-time analytics, and powerful APIs, it's the perfect solution for high-volume email sending.

name: ActiveCampaign
description: ActiveCampaign is a powerful email marketing platform that integrates with GoHighLevel. Features include dynamic content, AI-driven workflows, and connections to 950+ apps for comprehensive marketing automation.

name: QuickBooks
description: QuickBooks integrates directly with GoHighLevel to transfer financial data seamlessly. Perfect for tax compliance, reporting, invoicing, expense tracking, and comprehensive financial management.

name: Lemlist
description: Lemlist connects to GoHighLevel workflows to sync contacts and start personalized, multi-channel outreach sequences. Automatically trigger actions based on prospect activity and engagement.

name: NUACOM
description: NUACOM offers streamlined workflow with click-to-call functionality. Features include automatic call logging, text messaging, call recordings, AI analysis, advanced call routing, IVR, and comprehensive analytics.

name: Extendly
description: Industry-leading snapshots, 24/7 white-label tech support, done-for-you client onboarding, and captivating demo videos. Save 3-6 months of development time and $15,000+ in costs with comprehensive templates for SaaS, small business, and webinar niches.

name: HL Pro Tools
description: Unlimited branded support via live chat, email, and Zoom. Includes SaaS snapshot, industry funnels, white-label demo videos, theme builder, and power trainings. Your clients get support under your brand with 3.5-hour average response time.

name: Level Up Marketplace
description: Access 150+ apps with a single subscription. Fully white-labeled solution for CRM, marketing, e-commerce, and more. Includes unlimited support, 100+ video tutorials, and weekly new app releases. Powers 45% of the GHL App Marketplace.

name: GHL Central
description: Community-driven platform offering training courses, playbooks, snapshots, and white-label services. Features GHL 101 free course, University training, and marketplace partnerships with Extendly and other providers.

name: The Snapshot Marketplace
description: Premium marketplace with 100+ done-for-you snapshots and 57+ more in development. Ready-to-deploy templates for any niche including sales funnels, pipelines, automated workflows, and message templates.

name: GoHighLevel Shop
description: Offering turnkey snapshots, themes, UI/UX designs, graphic kits, and white-label support services. Includes 15 days of customization support after purchase for any snapshot needs.

name: Yext
description: Expand reputation management across 150+ listing sites beyond Google and Facebook. Update brand facts on 70+ publisher sites, monitor reviews, and manage your online presence. USA-only, resellable at $30/month agency cost.

name: AgencyAnalytics
description: White-label reporting and analytics platform that integrates with GoHighLevel. Create customizable dashboards to monitor KPIs, track opportunities, contacts, conversations, and visualize campaign success for clients.

name: SupplyGem
description: Comprehensive resource for GoHighLevel snapshots covering 26+ niches including real estate, fitness, dental, and more. Detailed guides, workflows, and templates to help agencies implement effective strategies quickly.

name: Streamline Results
description: Massive collection of 150+ GHL snapshots, white-label support partners, and done-for-you implementations. Comprehensive training and support for agencies looking to scale quickly with proven templates.

name: Apollo.io
tagline: B2B contact database with millions of verified contacts
description: Apollo.io is a sales intelligence and engagement platform with millions of verified B2B contacts and companies. Find leads with advanced filtering by industry, job title, location, and company size. Import quality leads directly into GoHighLevel to fuel your campaigns.
features: Millions of verified contacts and companies

name: Clay
tagline: Access 100+ data sources with AI-powered enrichment
description: Clay helps Go-To-Market teams access unique data from 100+ sources and AI agents for automating growth workflows. Enrich customer data in your GHL CRM, track intent signals, format data with AI, and constantly update your tools with fresh, accurate information.

name: Instantly.ai
tagline: Unlimited email sending with advanced deliverability
description: Scale your email outreach with unlimited email account connections and advanced deliverability optimization. Perfect for agencies and teams who need to send high volumes of cold emails alongside GHL's built-in email capabilities. AI-powered personalization and lead enrichment included.

name: Smartlead
description: Smartlead offers unlimited email sending with volume-based pricing that's perfect for agencies scaling their outreach. Unlike per-profile pricing tools, Smartlead lets you use unlimited profiles and send unlimited emails. Ideal for running cold email campaigns parallel to your GHL workflows.

name: Potion
description: Create multiple personalized videos featuring your own face and voice with automatically generated subtitles, logos, images, and GIFs. Customize landing pages with your branded domains, colors, CTAs, and calendar embeds. Perfect for adding high-touch video personalization to your GHL email campaigns.
features: Your face and voice in every video

name: n8n
description: n8n is a powerful, self-hosted automation platform that connects GoHighLevel with hundreds of tools and APIs without extensive coding. Create custom workflows, automate complex processes, and integrate with any service that has an API. Perfect for agencies needing advanced automation beyond GHL's built-in workflows.

name: LaGrowthMachine
description: LaGrowthMachine is the best multi-channel outreach automation platform, enabling you to reach prospects through email, LinkedIn, and Twitter in coordinated campaigns. Automatically sync with your GHL CRM and trigger multi-channel sequences based on prospect behavior.

name: Vidyard
description: Vidyard is a professional screen recorder and video hosting platform for sales teams. Create high-quality, impactful videos that effectively articulate your message. Embed videos in your GHL email campaigns to increase engagement and reply rates. Track who watches your videos and for how long.

name: Hippo Video
tagline: Video prospecting for every sales stage
description: Hippo Video stands out with unique features and sales video flows that cater to various stages of your sales process. Create personalized video messages, screen recordings, and video emails that can be embedded in your GHL campaigns. Share via email, LinkedIn, SMS, or social media.
features: Sales video flows for each stage

name: Sendspark
description: Sendspark makes video prospecting simple and effective with an easy-to-use platform for creating personalized video messages. Rated 4.8/5 on G2 with 341 reviews. Record videos quickly, customize thumbnails, and track engagement. Perfect for adding a personal touch to your GHL outreach campaigns.

name: Bardeen
description: Bardeen is a browser-based automation tool that works seamlessly with web-based GoHighLevel. Automate repetitive tasks like data entry, contact enrichment, and multi-app workflows without leaving your browser. No-code automation that connects your favorite tools together.

name: Snitcher
description: Snitcher is a B2B visitor identification platform that reveals companies visiting your website in real-time. Identify, enrich, and engage with anonymous website visitors automatically. Score and prioritize accounts showing buying intent, reveal verified details of key decision-makers, and trigger automations across your entire GTM stack.

name: Vapi
description: Vapi enables you to build, test, and deploy advanced voice AI agents in minutes. Create conversational voice AI that handles phone operations including customer support, appointment booking, and sales calls. Supports both inbound and outbound voice agent deployments with enterprise-grade reliability.
features: Bring your own models (transcription, LLM, TTS)
A/B testing for prompts and voices

name: GHL Utils
description: A browser extension designed to save GoHighLevel users time by providing AI-powered workflow analysis, instant audit log access, and faster navigation. Debug workflows, analyze contact data, and manage multiple GHL accounts more efficiently.

name: FlowKit
tagline: Free n8n, BuildShip & Make.com node library
description: A community-driven repository offering 250+ ready-to-use workflow nodes for automation platforms. Browse, search, and copy nodes directly into your workflows with no setup required. Supports n8n, BuildShip, and Make.com platforms.

name: GHL Animation Studios
tagline: Animated explainer videos for your white-label GHL
description: Engage, explain, and sign up more customers easily with professional animated videos. GHL Animation Studios produces animated explainer videos, promotional content, feature GIFs, and dashboard screenshots to help your white-label GoHighLevel appear as a professional software company.

name: Snapshot Store
description: Access a comprehensive collection of ready-to-use GoHighLevel snapshots across multiple niches. Save time and money by implementing proven templates, workflows, and automations for your agency or SaaS business.
